name: Ship go brrr
description:
Move with A and D and restart with R/Space.

Blue/Green powerups makes you faster and Orange/Yellow powerups makes you go slower. Both gives you +50 in score.

What score can you get?

Source code: https://github.com/Sefan90/MadeWithDefoldJam

Update 2020-08-01: HTML5 build added, no code chances done.
